Text: HealthcareBiotech Firm Night tonightCome to the HealthcareBiotech Firm Night Tonight Nov pm Bring your resume if you didnt submit it already Interested in Business Development Finance Marketing Sales and Consulting Positions in Biotechnology and Healthcare Come find out about exciting careers at premier Biotechnology Medical Device Pharmaceutical Management Consulting and Health Services Companies at the MBA HealthcareBiotechnology Firm Night on Monday November pm Marines Memorial Club Sutter Street San Francisco Companies that will be attending Agilent Axys Pharmaceuticals Blue Shield Chiron Earnst Young Cap Gemini ePocrates Fluidigm Genentech Genetics InstituteNovartis Gilead Sciences Guidant Kaiser LifescanJJ McKesson PRTM Food and drinks will be served Dress is Business Casual To Attend Bring your resume if you did not submit it to the resume book already Cost of Admission Members of the Haas Biotech Club or aas Club ie you have paid club dues for FREE ADMISSION NonMembers have options Attach a check to your resume payable to the Haas Biotech Club for for admission to Firm Night or Join either the Haas Biotech Club or aas Club for for and get into Firm Night free Attach a check to your resume for payable to the name of the club you want to join Please visit the club websites for more information Haas Biotech Club haasbio aas Club hcc Directions FROM EAST BAYBAY BRIDGE Take th StreetDowntown Exit Exit to the left Veer Left onto Harrison Street Take Harrison block West to th Street and turn Right Cross Market Street becomes Taylor Street Follow Taylor to Bush Street Make a Right on Bush Follow Bush to Mason Make a Right on Mason Follow Mason to Sutter Make a Right on Sutter The Club is at Sutter Street on the corner of Mason Street BART Take BART from Berkeley and get off at the Powell stop Walk up Powell St and turn left onto Sutter St The Club is at Sutter Street on the corner of Mason Street
